subItems.name: Viscous Compound
subItems.description: Thick, protective gel for slow-moving machinery and bearings

subItems.name: Plasma Gel
subItems.description: Ionized lubricant that adapts to temperature changes dynamically

subItems.description: Low-viscosity fluid optimized for high-speed engines and turbines

subItems.name: Frictionless Fluid
subItems.description: Theoretical maximum efficiency: nearly zero coefficient of friction

subItems.description: Paradoxical fluid that remains slippery while increasing system stability

subItems.name: Quantum Slick
subItems.description: Exists in superposition, lubricating multiple components simultaneously

subItems.name: Positronic Relay
subItems.description: Antimatter-grade switch for high-voltage circuit control

subItems.name: Pulse Circuit

subItems.description: Intelligent actuator that positions itself with remarkable accuracy

subItems.name: Piston Assembly
subItems.description: Converts pressure into linear motion with steady, reliable force

subItems.name: Gear Cluster
subItems.description: Interlocking teeth transmit rotational force with mechanical advantage

subItems.name: Bearing Ring
subItems.description: Distributes load across a circular race, enabling smooth rotation

subItems.name: Valve Unit
subItems.description: Controls flow direction and pressure with mechanical or electrical actuation

subItems.name: Rotor Blade
subItems.description: Captures or transfers energy through rotational aerodynamic action

items.description: Light manipulation and detection devices for sensing and communication

subItems.name: Laser Module
subItems.description: Coherent light beam generator for cutting, welding, or measurement

subItems.name: Photon Lens
subItems.description: Focuses or disperses light with quantum-precision optics

subItems.name: Spectrum Prism
subItems.description: Separates light into component wavelengths for analysis or art

subItems.description: Detects light across multiple spectra for imaging and reconnaissance

subItems.name: Mirror Unit
subItems.description: Perfect reflection surface for redirecting or magnifying light paths

subItems.name: Diffraction Grating
subItems.description: Splits light into spectral components for analysis or display effects
